item.value_smv: Group of fostering drugs increases resistance

page.productDescription_html:
QUALITY INDICATOR:

Main substance

Beta-Glucan (min)

Sorbitol (min)

Vitamin C (min)

Other substances:

Protein (min)

Carrier

(MOS, dextrose, lactose, toxin adsorbents, ...) vđ


Prohibited substance: Not available

MAIN MATERIAL:

β-glucan (1,3-1,6), Sorbitol, Vitamin C, yeast cell wall, mannan-oligosaccharide (MOS), dextrose, lactose, toxic adsorbent (Toxibind dry), ...

USES:

- Improve resistance, strengthen the natural immune system for cattle and poultry.

- Enhance the immune response after vaccination.

- Supplement vitamins, nutritional sources for microorganisms

- Supplement vitamins, nutrition sources for beneficial microorganisms to develop, enhance liver function, increase food metabolism, help gain weight fast, increase productivity, shorten farming time.

- Reduce stress when the weather changes, vaccines, moving cages, chickens, high density, cut beak, molting, ...

- As one of the alternatives, limiting antibiotics used in livestock.

HOW TO USE:

Mix into feed to eat.

- Cattle, pigs, goats, sheep: 1kg / ton of feed.

- Chickens, ducks and quails: 1-2kg / ton of feed

Each continuous use 7-10 days. Use 1-2 times / month.

Should be used before and after vaccination 7 days, help quickly create antibodies against disease.

* During the epidemic season: the dose is 2-4 times higher than the regular dose.

USED ​​ONLY IN VETERINARY

STORAGE: in a cool dry place, temperature not exceeding 30oC.

PRESENTATION: 100g, 1Kg
